moduleMetadataJson.name: SolarWinds TFTP Server 10.4.0.10 Denial of Service
moduleMetadataJson.description:
The SolarWinds TFTP server can be shut down by sending a 'netascii' read
        request with a specially crafted file name.
author: Nullthreat
